roleset.name: to make pregnant, full with, full with (child)
roleset.note: IMPREGNATE-V NOTES: Created by Claire. Frames file for 'impregnate' based on sentences in Webtext 2.5-2; adjectival 'pregnant' by Julia based on BOLT-6. Verbnet entry 9.8. (from impregnate.01-v)
PREGNANT-J NOTES: Added by Julia based on SMS. (from pregnant.01-j)

role.descr: entity arg1 is pregnant with, baby

example.name: impregnate-v: Sentiment baby, art woman
example.text: It suffices that I was not an exception among my compatriots, since this is a very Spanish characteristic, and [our art]-1, exponent of the Spanish spirit, was impregnated *-1 with these two sentiments.

example.name: pregnant-j; args 0, 1
example.text: Is the title of this thread "what would you do if your daughter was pregnant by a crackhead"?

example.name: pregnant-j: arg1
example.text: I hear you . Let 's be glad you wo n't be pregnant anymore once the intense heat sets in ! Glad you 're out and about . Keep hydrating , so important .
example.arg: once the intense heat sets in
